text.p: Dyna Caroway - (built 1995) 157,991 dwt del Japan early Sept trip via E.Australia redel Continent $13,100 daily K Line.
Mineral Venture - (built 1995) 149,000 dwt del Moneypoint mid Sept trip via Punta da Madeira redel S.Korea $20,400 daily Cho Yang.
Pride - (built 1981) 132,000 dwt del Flushing end August trip via Brazil and Constanza redel Cape Passero approx. $13,250 daily BHP.
Leopardi - (built 1982) 129,088 dwt del Rotterdam mid Sept trip via Baltimore redel Moneypoint $13,300 daily Keoyang.
Luise Oldendorff - (built 1994) 72,873 dwt 14 on 32.5 del Plate early Sept trip Far East $12,500 daily plus $250,000 bb Glencore.
Ermioni - (built 1976) 66,157 dwt 13 on 38 plus 2.5 del Brazil prompt trip WC Mexico $7,500 daily plus $125,000 bb Armada.
New Horizon - (built 1984) 66,700 dwt 14 on 39 del Jorf Lasfar 22/25 Aug two laden legs via Brazil and U.S. Gulf redel Far East $10,000 daily 1st 30 days $12,000 for the balance CCT.
Vancouver - (built 1977) 64,005 dwt 12.5 on 36 plus 2.5 del Gibraltar spot trip via Morocco redel China $11,750 daily Transfield.
